articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Former Trump vaccine czar fired over substantiated sexual harassment claim - Ars Technica
articles.description: GSK hired a law firm for an investigation, which substantiated the claims.
articles.content: Enlarge/ President Donald Trump listens as Moncef Slaoui, the former head of GlaxoSmithKlines vaccines division, speaks about coronavirus vaccine development in the Rose Garden of the White House on â€¦ [+3063 chars]
